attributes.action: Demand Accrington Stanley visit Huncoat School and give football tops to year 3.
attributes.additional_details: Please write to Graham Jones, local MP. This situation needs sorting. Pronto.
attributes.background: It's been a bad day. Turns out Accrington Stanley FC had local schools round to give out free jerseys; met the players etc. Only Huncoat Primary missed out. Possibly a school issue. Might have been the club. Don't know. Local mums going over the top, unlike their kids cos they haven't gotten any.
